about_the_game:
Embark on an Adventure in a Strange and Mysterious World with Your Adorable Buddy!

"Mononoke no Kuni" is an adventure game where you explore a strange and mysterious world inhabited by Mononoke creatures, alongside a Shiba Inu puppy named "Musashi." In this world, various Mononoke are waiting to meet you.

Game Features

  • You will meet Mononokes with various personalities like 'Nekomata' (cat Mononoke), 'Gama' (frog Mononoke), 'Komi' (fox Mononoke), and 'Mujina' (raccoon Mononoke), and enjoy interacting with them.

    Some of these Mononokes have become wild due to unknown reasons and appear as 'Mamono'.

    Your goal is to fight monsters to save this world, gather sacred artifacts, and defeat the bosses.

    The world of 'Mononoke' is depicted with artistic graphics, with each region having different landscapes and atmospheres, creating a mysterious and fascinating world.

    Together with your companion Musashi, you will embark on an adventure.

    A puppy that died in the real world must save the world of Mononoke to live as a god. Can you defeat the bosses with Musashi?

　

　

Interacting with Mononoke and Musashi

The Mononoke have worries and concerns. Help them out with Musashi! You might find some good things come your way...

　

　

Purifying Mamono-fied Mononoke

When Mononoke become violent, they turn into Mamono. Using the divine power granted by Musashi, the player can return them to their original form. Work together with Musashi to purify the attacking Mamonos.

　

　

Bonding with Musashi

Your travel buddy, Musashi, is a tiny Shiba Inu puppy. When you’re tired, take some time to chat and bond with Musashi. No matter the situation, the two of you can handle anything together.

　

　

　

Start your adventure in "Mononoke no Kuni" today!
